activities.name: CP_ICR_MASTER_DATA
activities.description: Item Master - Extract

query.value:
select replace(MATERIAL_TEXT,'"','') as MATERIAL_TEXT,MATERIAL_14,ABU_ID,ABU_DESC,CATEGORY_ID,CATEGORY_DESC,PRODUCT_FAMILY_ID,
PRODUCT_FAMILY_DESC,X_DIST_CHAIN_STATUS,BRACKET_CURRENCY,BRACKET_PRICE,replace(SHELF,'"','') as SHELF,DC_TO_CUST_WHSE,
 IT_FF_DESCRIPTION,ITEM_FRESH_FRZN_CD,ITM_BSE_CD,NET_WT_CSE_QTY,BASE_UOM,CUBE_ADJUSTED_WT,NIC,
 SAP_MATERIAL_TYPE,to_char(current_timestamp,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as "data_extract_date"
 from
"_SYS_BIC"."kraft.SCM.Logistics_Reporting/CV_PRODUCT_MASTER_CERT"

activities.name: CP_ICR_WASTE_DATA
activities.description: Waste Delta - Extract

query.value:
select MATERIAL_14,SOLD_TO_CUSTOMER,CUSTOMER_NAME,CUSTOMER_ZIP,CUSTOMER_LEVEL_05,IBL_KEY,IBL_DESCRIPTION,
IBL_ZIP,CASES_SHIPPED,WASTE_TYPE_DESC,BILL_DATE,CODE_DATE_TYPE,CODE_DATE,SHELFLIFE_REMAIN,COST,
WASTE_IN_DOLLAR,GROSS_REVENUE,NET_LBS_SHIPPED,to_char(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as "DATA_EXTRACT_DATE"
from "_SYS_BIC"."kraft.SCM.Logistics_Reporting/CV_WASTE_EXTRACTION_CERT"
where  BILL_DATE < (select distinct CALENDER_DATE from "_SYS_BIC"."kraft.RTR.GDSR/CV_GDSR_FISC_CALENDAR" 
where CALENDER_DATE = TO_VARCHAR (current_date, 'YYYYMMDD'))
and  BILL_DATE >= (select distinct CALENDER_DATE from "_SYS_BIC"."kraft.RTR.GDSR/CV_GDSR_FISC_CALENDAR" 
where CALENDER_DATE = add_days(TO_VARCHAR (current_date, 'YYYYMMDD'),-7))

activities.name: Audit_PipelineStart
activities.description: Insert pipeline start Audit entry into khc_audit_log table

activities.name: Audit_PipelineEnd
activities.description: update the Audit entry for the pipeline  run id to success

activities.name: CP_ICR_PIL
activities.description: PIL Data - Extract

query.value:
select MATERIAL_14,LOCATION,CODE_DATE,CODE_DATE_TYPE,AGE_STATUS,INVENTORY_DISPOSITION_CODE,
ONHAND_INV,UNSOLD_QTY,CUSTOMER_GUARANTEE,DAYS_TO_CUSTOMER_GUARANTEE as "DAYS_TO_CG",DAYS_TO_EXPIRATION,EXPIRATION_DATE,
to_char(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as "DATA_EXTRACT_DATE"
from "_SYS_BIC"."kraft.SCM.Logistics_Reporting/CV_PROJINVLOSS_EXTRACTION_CERT"
